admin_start:
Telegram bot for conversion voice messages to text.
----- List of commands -----
/start - This command.
/convert - Main bot function. Converts voice messages to text. For using it you need to be in list of trusted users. Message @khivus for permission.
Usage: Reply to any voice message with /convert.
/language - Changes language.
Currently available languages: Russian, English.
/about - Information about bot and developer.
----- List of admin commands -----
/addtrusted - Add user to trusted list.
/deltrusted - Remove user from trusted list.
/showtrusted - Show list of all trusted users.
/enabletrusted - Enable /convert only for trusted users.
/disabletrusted - Enable /convert for all users.
--------------------------------------
For any questions or suggestions message @khivus.
